'Game Changer' box office collection Day 2: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani starrer mints a whopping Rs 72.5 - TOI Etimes
summary:
Game Changer box office collection Day 2: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani starrer mints a whopping Rs 72.5 crore

Publication Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Times of India

'Game Changer', directed by Shankar, hit the screens on January 10, 2025, and has garnered significant earnings. The film received positive reviews, especially for Ram Charan's performance.

  • The film grossed Rs 51 crore on its opening day.
  • On the second day, it earned Rs 21.5 crore, bringing the total to Rs 72.5 crore.
  • Second day earnings breakdown: Rs 12.7 crore (Telugu), Rs 7 crore (Hindi), Rs 1.7 crore (Tamil), Rs 10 lakhs (Kannada).
  • The overall occupancy rates were strong, with 31.19% in Telugu theatres.
  • The film features Ram Charan as an IAS officer fighting against corruption.
“The film is likely to dominate the box office during the upcoming festive season.”

The success of 'Game Changer' suggests a promising run at the box office, with expectations of sustained earnings in the weeks to come.
newTitle: Game Changer box office collection Day 2: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani starrer mints a whopping Rs 72.5 crore

Anil Ravipudi turning down Thalapathy 69 puzzles fans - 123telugu
summary:
Anil Ravipudi Turning Down Thalapathy 69 Puzzles Fans

Published on: Jan 12, 2025 9:00 am IST

Tollywood director Anil Ravipudi, known for his successful track record, is gearing up for the release of his film Sankranthiki Vasthunnam on January 14, 2025. Recently, during a promotional event, actor VTV Ganesh revealed that Thalapathy 69 is a remake of Bhagavanth Kesari. However, Anil reportedly turned down the chance to direct Vijay.

  • Director Anil Ravipudi is preparing for the release of Sankranthiki Vasthunnam.
  • Actor VTV Ganesh disclosed Thalapathy 69 as a remake, but Anil declined to direct it.
  • Fans speculate on the reasons behind Anil's decision, pondering his preference for original stories.
  • Fans are eager for an explanation regarding his choice.
“The reason behind his decision remains unclear.”

This surprising decision has left fans puzzled and speculating about Anil's future projects.
newTitle: Anil Ravipudi Turning Down Thalapathy 69 Puzzles Fans

Kangana Ranaut holds first screening of Emergency for Nitin Gadkari: 'After 6 months of struggle, film is ready' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Kangana Ranaut Holds Special Screening of 'Emergency' for Nitin Gadkari

Date: Jan 12, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Kangana Ranaut held a special screening of her upcoming film 'Emergency' in Nagpur, attended by Union Minister Nitin Gadkari and co-star Anupam Kher. The film is set for release on January 17.

  • Kangana discussed the film's strict censor board scrutiny and lengthy preparation process.
  • Nitin Gadkari praised the film for accurately portraying a significant historical period in India.
  • The film features notable actors including Anupam Kher and Shreyas Talpade.
“Today, we are actually having the first screening of the film... After six months of struggle, the film is finally ready.” - Kangana Ranaut

The film aims to shed light on the Emergency period imposed by Indira Gandhi from 1975 to 1977.
newTitle: Kangana Ranaut Holds Special Screening of 'Emergency' for Nitin Gadkari

title: Game Changer team quietly adds ‘Naanaa Hyraanaa’ song from day 2 - 123telugu
summary:
Game Changer team quietly adds ‘Naanaa Hyraanaa’ song from day 2

Published on Jan 12, 2025, 8:00 am IST

The Game Changer team has unexpectedly added the song 'Naanaa Hyraanaa' starting from the second day of the film's release to attract audiences back to theaters.

  • Ram Charan and Shankar's collaboration in the political drama Game Changer released on January 10, 2025.
  • The film grossed Rs. 186 crore on its opening day.
  • The song 'Naanaa Hyraanaa,' initially left out, will officially be included from January 14, 2025.
  • The film stars Kiara Advani alongside a strong supporting cast, including SJ Suryah and Anjali.
  • Produced by Dil Raju under Sri Venkateswara Creations, with music by Thaman.
The film has received mixed reactions so far.

This shift aims to enhance the viewing experience and perhaps improve audience reception over time.
newTitle: Game Changer team quietly adds ‘Naanaa Hyraanaa’ song from day 2

Daaku Maharaaj director Bobby expresses gratitude in a heartfelt note - 123telugu
summary:
Director Bobby Expresses Heartfelt Gratitude For Daaku Maharaaj

Published on Jan 12, 2025 7:24 am IST

Director Bobby Kolli's film, Daaku Maharaaj, featuring Nandamuri Balakrishna, releases today. He took to social media to share a heartfelt note reflecting on the film's journey and expressing gratitude to his team.

  • Bobby expresses excitement for audiences to experience the film after two years of production.
  • The film tells the story of a noble man fighting for others, transcending the typical action entertainer genre.
  • Bobby thanks fans and acknowledges the contributions of the entire team, including cast members and crew.
  • The film features a notable cast including Bobby Deol as the antagonist and music composed by Thaman.
  • Bobby ends his note with the slogan, “Jai Balayya!” inviting everyone to enjoy the film this Sankranthi.
Dear audience,
Today is an incredibly special day for me and the entire team of #DaakuMaharaaj.
It marks the culmination of 2 years of passion and hard work.

In conclusion, Bobby's heartfelt message showcases the dedication behind Daaku Maharaaj and invites fans to celebrate its release.
newTitle: Director Bobby Expresses Heartfelt Gratitude For Daaku Maharaaj

title: Rashmika Mandanna shares health update after sustaining leg injury, apologises to her film directors for delay. See post - Hindustan Times
summary:
Rashmika Mandanna Shares Health Update After Sustaining Leg Injury

Publication Date: Jan 12, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Rashmika Mandanna has provided an update on her health following a leg injury sustained at the gym. She took to Instagram to share her situation and apologized to directors of her films for the resulting delays.

  • Rashmika Mandanna was injured at the gym, leading to the need for recovery.
  • She has expressed her apologies to directors of upcoming films like Sikandar, Thama, and Kubera.
  • Rashmika described being in 'hop mode' for the foreseeable future.
  • She reassured her directors of her commitment to return to work soon.
  • The injury has caused temporary halts in filming her projects.
“To my directors, sorry for the delay…I’ll be back soon enough just making sure my legs are fit for action.”

Rashmika is currently celebrating the success of her latest film, Pushpa 2: The Rule, and has several upcoming projects lined up.
newTitle: Rashmika Mandanna Shares Health Update After Sustaining Leg Injury

summary:

Published On: Jan 12, 2025 | Published By: Ayush Bisht

This weekly horoscope reveals the luck and predictions for each zodiac sign from January 12 to January 18, providing insights into personal and professional aspects of life.

  • Aries: On a roll with solutions and potential recognition; students to excel.
  • Taurus: A crisis averted; focus on the present to move forward.
  • Gemini: Strengthen community connections; mental health improves.
  • Cancer: Assertive leadership; family harmony; trust your judgment on investments.
  • Leo: Time to slow down and appreciate life; recoveries in health.
  • Virgo: Work feels tedious; focus on peace at home.
  • Libra: Be aware of indirect actions from others; love life gets busier.
  • Scorpio: Calm approach helps in managing stress and family matters.
  • Sagittarius: Nostalgia returns with a focus on lessons learned.
  • Capricorn: Transition brings new routines; adaptability is key.
  • Aquarius: Productivity spikes with multiple projects; watch for manipulative individuals.
  • Pisces: A quiet period for rest and reflection; consider spiritual practices.

title: Telangana govt withdraws orders allowing ticket price hike for Ram Charan starrer 'Game Changer' - Deccan Herald
summary:
Telangana Government Withdraws Ticket Price Hike for 'Game Changer'

Date: 12 January 2025

Source: Deccan Herald

The Telangana government has withdrawn its earlier orders that allowed for a hike in ticket prices for the Ram Charan starrer 'Game Changer', complying with directions from the High Court.

  • The government had initially approved higher ticket prices for special early morning shows.
  • The new orders will take effect from January 16.
  • High Court directed that early morning shows will not be permitted until public health and safety are assessed.
  • Criticism arose from opposition MLA regarding the original price hike approval.
“The state Cinematography Minister spoke against the price hike in the wake of a tragic incident at a previous film premiere.”

This decision reflects the government's response to public safety concerns and legal directives.
newTitle: Telangana Government Withdraws Ticket Price Hike for 'Game Changer'

title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection Day 38: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandana’s mass entertainer continues to - TOI Etimes
summary:
'Pushpa 2' Box Office Collection Day 38: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandana’s Mass Entertainer Continues to Shine

Publication Date: December 5, 2025

Source: Sacnilk

'Pushpa 2', starring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, has kept up its impressive box office performance on its 6th Saturday, grossing ₹2 crore and bringing its total to over ₹1200 crore.

  • The film opened with ₹164.25 crore on its release day.
  • Week 1 earnings amounted to ₹725.8 crore.
  • Despite facing competition, 'Pushpa 2' continues to thrive.
  • Weekwise collection breakdown: Week 2 - ₹264.8 crore, Week 3 - ₹129.5 crore, Week 4 - ₹69.65 crore, Week 5 - ₹23.25 crore.
“It is here to stay…”

The film's consistency at the box office indicates it will maintain strong performance amid new releases.
newTitle: 'Pushpa 2' Box Office Success Continues on Day 38

title: Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 12, 2025 - Hindustan Times
summary:

This horoscope focuses on various zodiac signs and their love predictions for today, emphasizing the need to let go of the past and embrace new romantic opportunities.

  • Aries: Let go of the past to make room for new opportunities.
  • Taurus: Release unsuitable connections to explore new romantic experiences.
  • Gemini: Communicate your need for space to strengthen love.
  • Cancer: Confidence will attract romance; seize special moments.
  • Leo: Opportunity to connect with others based on honesty and trust.
  • Virgo: Engage in conversations that may lead to romantic connections.

title: Official: Thalapathy69 is the remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari - 123telugu
summary:
Official: Thalapathy69 is the remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari

Published on Jan 12, 2025

Thalapathy Vijay is currently working on his last film, Thalapathy69, which will be his focus before shifting entirely to politics. The film is directed by H. Vinoth and is in production, with confirmatory remarks about its basis being a remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari.

  • Thalapathy Vijay has shown a keen interest in Bhagavanth Kesari, watching it five times.
  • VTV Ganesh confirmed the remake at a promotional event, detailing Vijay's involvement and his initial reluctance from other directors to adapt the film.
“Vijay sir liked Bhagavanth Kesari pretty much. He watched the film for five times.” - VTV Ganesh

This news heightens anticipation among fans of both Vijay and the original film.
newTitle: Thalapathy69 Confirmed as Remake of Bhagavanth Kesari
